tool_description: Creates initial project structure and timeline for RFP development, establishing key milestones and resource requirements.

procurement_category.description: Category of goods/services being procured (IT, construction, consulting, etc.)

error_messages: Invalid procurement category: Must specify a valid category such as IT, construction, consulting, manufacturing, or services.
Budget out of range: Estimated budget must be a positive number greater than $1,000.
Invalid duration: Project duration must be between 1 and 120 months.
Missing required fields: Project name, procurement category, estimated budget, and project duration are required.
usage: Provide project_name, procurement_category, estimated_budget, and project_duration_months. Optionally set urgency_level. The tool establishes project framework and timeline for RFP development.

project_id.description: Unique identifier for the RFP project

timeline_weeks.description: Recommended RFP development timeline in weeks

key_milestones.description: List of key project milestones and activities
